mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM board
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET read_cnt = read_cnt+1 WHERE board_id=#{board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_id, user_id, board_title, board_content, read_cnt, reg_date) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{user_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT board_id, board_title, reg_date, read_cnt FROM board WHERE board_title LIKE '%'||#{board_title}||'%' ORDER BY board_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content} WHERE board_id=#{board_id}
mapper.select: select a.user_id,b.COMMENT_CONTENTS, b.board_id from board a, reply b where a.board_id = b.board_id and b.board_id = #{board_id}
